Topic.Title: Have gap and dot in command

Posts.EditableText:
Hello again,
from the last problem i've made some new things in my game.
I can run some commands, when i try to run help, it will write me other commands.
when i want to open some file, you must write : run (name of file)
Its not working, when i want to show email, i must write run (nameofmail).mail
but it not works, I guess its by i can't write gap and dot to the command.
Can somehow help me to make it work?

Posts.EditableText: Quest breaks up commands on the dot, which is part of your problem. It was discussed on another thread, which includes a way to stop it doing that: viewtopic.php?f=10&t=4624 having a gap should not be a problem, plenty of commands do that (GET HAT, GO NORTH, etc.).
Posts.HTML:
Quest breaks up commands on the dot, which is part of your problem. It was discussed on another thread, which includes a way to stop it doing that:

viewtopic.php?f=10&t=4624

having a gap should not be a problem, plenty of commands do that (GET HAT, GO NORTH, etc.).
